column4: can somebody please help me get natulis to think im sudo already? without using console, gui only

permission for what ?
all space you need to do that is your /home/username folder
outside that aerea its no playground
stay out of that earea
you are not running windows
ugh get linspire
creat a rootaccount and login as root
alt-f2 and put the command in there
if you instist on using root continuasly you'd better create a root account and log in as root
dont use sudo or anything like that when root
sounds that being root all the time the system is already broken
dont use sudo or anything
you have it all without needing sudo
suso if for non root users
root is root the boss
running as root all the time underestimates the powers of root destruct
as root no
